about_the_game:
DODGE HUNDREDS OF BULLETS AND VANQUISH MIGHTY FOES

A unique Bullet Hell adventure!


Bullet Casters is an unconventional wave-based shoot ‘em up where you will face more than 50 hand-crafted levels on your quest to solve a mystery that threatens the lands of Silveris.
Each stage is bite-sized and packed with unique monsters and intricate shooting patterns that will test both your skills and wits. Not getting hit and clearing under a certain time will improve your evaluation!

Create your own Bullet Hell


Bullet Casters also features a never-before seen local PvP mode where one player has to conquer a castle by shooting down its gate while the opponent has to stop them by summoning an army of monsters. Each creature has different traits that can be altered and combined with those of other units to create your own Bullet Hell!

FEATURES


- More than 50 short but intense stages, including many fierce boss battles.
- 4 playable characters, each with their own play style.
- A whimsical story that can be experienced from the perspective of any of the characters.
- Unlockable companions that allow for different approaches to each challenge.
- A unique PvP mode where you can create your Bullet Hell on the fly.
- Many monsters, each with unique shooting patterns and abilities.
- A rich soundtrack composed by Dominic Ninmark, inspired by Arcade classics.
